scenario_text.value:
Hehehe! Hee Hee! It’s fine! Everything’s
going to be fine! I get it now!
Mommy’s here! I’m going to see my mommy!
Mommy! Mommy, it’s me! Hee, hee hee, help me!
Oh, you poor little boy.
Eep?!

You want to see your mommy that badly? Then
come right over here, you poor baby.
Urgh, you... you’re a fake!
You’re not my mommy! You betrayed me!

Mommy would never betray me. Never! She’d be
there to save me, no matter what!

Don’t you see? I’m going to meet my mommy!
You got that?! Mommy, save me!
What? Have you lost your mind completely?

Shut up! I’m not talking to you, I’m talking
to Mommy! Get lost!

Mommy... I’ve tried so hard, for so long...
I’ve been wanting to see you so badly!

Come get me, Mommy! Come quickly! Ahaha,
hahaha! Hehehehahahaha!

My, my, what a shame. I do believe this child
is broken. Now, what to do with him?

I suppose I ought to perform the ritual and
offer him as a sacrifice...

...but that would make him a part of this
world...
Yes, I suppose he’ll just have to die.
Cyclomon, come here, would you?
Ye...yes, Lady Archnemon?

Kill this boy for me, would you? It should be
easy enough. I’ll leave it to you.
Under...understood, My Lady.

Very good. I shall return to the altar, then.
He’s yours.
I...will do...my job.

Huh? Wh-what the?! Hey, stop! What’s going
on?! Mommy! Waaah!
Stay still! Hard to...catch.

I shall...drop you...from here.
Kill you...for sure!
Waaaaaaaaah! Help me, Mommyyy!
Ugh...shut up... Quiet! Take...this!
Gah!

WaaaAAAaaah!! Mommyyy! Mommyyy! Save me,
Mommyyy! Aaahh!
Hmm... Sick...of this. Time...to...to end you.
Ryo!
Hmmm...?
Huh?! What is that thing?!
A huge one-eyed monster?!

That is Cyclomon. A brute concerned only
with his own power.

Don’t let the size of him scare you. He’s
a total buffoon.
Eek! Is Ryo still all right?
He’s trying to resist. He’s still okay!
Then we need to save him, fast!
I’m scared, but I’ll do my best!
Kewww!
Kunemon says he wants us to save Ryo.

We’re on it. Don’t worry, Kunemon, we’ll save
him!

Haru, Miyuki, stay back. This could be
dangerous!
Okay...
Okay...
All right, everybody, let’s do this!
